item.description:
Suggested donation: $5 to cover costs of projector, beverages and Pizza

Prototyping is a cheap, easy way to develop and test design concepts without building an entire website first. Tools range from pencils & paper, to Visio or Illustrator, to complex scripting tools like Flash.

This workshop will give an introduction to the purpose and process of prototyping and demonstrate some of the most popular tools that are out there. After a break, we will then give a "design challenge" and break the audience into groups to try out prototyping first-hand.

The entire workshop will be about two hours, including break time.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Where to Draw the Line? How to test design ideas without building a whole site
